snippet: David Cameron of Britain and Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany have begun a “not purely routine” weekend visit to discuss Britain’s future in the European Union.

byline.original: By MELISSA EDDY and STEPHEN CASTLE

lead_paragraph: David Cameron of Britain and Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany have begun a “not purely routine” weekend visit to discuss Britain’s future in the European Union.

headline.seo: Cameron and Merkel to Discuss British Role in Bloc
headline.main: In Cameron and Merkel Visit, a Chance to Discuss British Role in Europe
headline.print_headline: In Cameron and Merkel Visit, a Chance to Discuss British Role in Europe
